m_szDocTitle: Bob Lutz Talks Trash About Tesla Model X & EVs... Again | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: And now his VIA truck business is missing in action. Marcel Wasn’t this guy still at GM when they needed to be bailed out? Truth hurts He is right, there is no technology to produce cheap EVs. Thats why they call every EV  luxurious. Bob_Wallace Both you and Lutz must not be keeping up with the news. sjc_1 Clutz should stick to electric trucks. Ed Hey, everybody. Bob has done some good things in his career, so let’s cut him some slack…even though at this stage, he is starting to sounds like my crazy Uncle Bob; suddenly going Luddite on us….with a pulpit! I suggest we ask Bob to: 1) Explain the
